CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Infosys is a leading global IT services provider, with nearly 250,000 employees. Based in Bangalore, the Indian IT services firm leverages its offshore outsourcing model to derive 60% of its revenue from North America. The company offers traditional IT services offerings: consulting, managed services and cloud infrastructure services, and business process outsourcing as a service (BPaaS).

value.name: Salil S. Parekh
value.title: Chief Executive Officer, Executive Director & MD
